}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== WPC100 serial numbers appear to start with '''MS2'''.
"WPCA-153GN_V04", "190-D04-1100R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA5605|05/06/2008}}
